official_title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to remove the budget of the Postal Rate Commission from the control of the Postal Service.

summary.text: Removes the budget of the Postal Rate Commission from the control of the Postal Service. Directs the Commission to submit its annual budget to the President. Directs the President to include that submission in the Federal budget transmitted to Congress each year.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to remove the budget of the Postal Rate Commission from the control of the Postal Service.
